ComicInfo.Title: The Drowning Hymn Revisited
ComicInfo.Summary:
MINISERIES FINALE
Hexware and the Helljumpers face the true architect of Jesiâ€™s murder as the walled Urban Zone is assaulted by zealots on one side and unstoppable androids on the other. Can Jesi retain her humanity when everything she believes in is a lie?
The thrilling final issue of the series by TIM SEELEY and rising-star artist ZULEMA SCOTTO LAVINA is here!
